text: hey guys it's angel in my last video I
showed you guys how to make a three
ingredient green tea ice cream and at
the end of that video I asked you guys
what other ice cream flavors you wanted
to see as I was reading through the
comments I noticed that quite a few of
you asked for like E as an ice cream
flavor so let's see I'm going to do a
quick shout out to doggie Skye paw and
Veronica are this video is for you guys
so today I'm making a light cheat lime
sorbet
now why sorbet and not an ice cream it's
because I really like light she is a
flavor and a fruit and I thought it
would be great to have it stand out on
its own in a sorbet not because I don't
have half and half
definitely not because I ran out of half
and a half today okay yes I ran out of
half and half anyways this is a three
and a half ingredients sorbet recipe and
I'm saying half of an ingredient because
I added a couple pinches of salt and I'm
not sure if you call a couple pinches of
salt a full ingredient so I'm going with
three and a half for this recipe we are
going to need one can of whole light
cheese now I'm using canned light key
because hey I'm lazy and B you don't
always find fresh light cheese at the
store so definitely a good alternative
is can't light cheese now if you're
wondering this is a 20 ounce can of
whole seedless light cheese and you can
find this at your local Asian grocery
store will also need a quarter cup of
organic cane sugar two tablespoons of
fresh lime juice now if you like yours
extra tart and extra limey you can go
ahead and double that and make that four
tablespoons and finally behalf of
ingredient two to three pinches of salts
start by draining the liquid from your
can of light cheese and add that to your
blender or a food processor then
combined with your cane sugar add lime
juice to taste and finally a few pinches
of salt we're going to blend for about
30 seconds or until the mixture
is super smooth ensuring that it's well
blended will help give your survey a
smooth creamy texture when it's done
blending transfer the mixture to a
container and chill the fridge for a few
hours or overnight until cold when
you're ready to make your survey turn
the puree in your ice cream maker or an
ice cream pan which is what I'm using
today and you'll have a refreshing and
delicious homemade light cheese sorbet
now this recipe makes just over one cup
and I usually like to serve this light
cheese sorbet in small serving dishes
garnished with a mint leaf of course if
you have any leftovers you can always
freeze those for later now if you're
interested I'm storing my sorbets in
these little ice cream containers that I
found online they are by tavolo they're
super cute they come in a pack of four
and I like them because they're
dishwasher safe they're reusable and
they prevent ice cream burn or freezer
burn or sorbet burn but they're super
cute and that is how I'm storing mine
today so if you guys are interested in
this I'll post a link in the video
description below I'm angel thank you
guys so much for watching give me a
thumbs up if you want to see more ice
cream flavors or Asian ice cream flavors
and I will see you guys soon
now for the taste test
hmmm so smooth I love the light cheese
flavors and there's that hint of lime
it's so refreshing definitely would be
really good after sushi why do I have a
sushi craving oh hi
kinetic reservations for tonight at the
sushi bar great how about 6:30 perfect
